first_story_block:
Heyya all!


Do you like this game yet? What? Yeah, I know the background story, fine....jeez, you don't have to ruin everything!


Okay, here's the story.


You are a completly normal kid, not destined to be great or anything... no-one in your family went missing, and you are a not on a mission to save the world... Bet you didn't expect that? This game isn't about some great warrior, prophecy thingy... It's just about a man on a journey.


What? You actually wanted that old cliche? Fine I'll think of something while you...do what you do.


Sorry for any spelling mistakes... my native language isn't english... The autocorrector says that I didn't even write "english" correctly...


Also, this is my first time using the advanced editor...yeah...

action_results.result:
Age 7


Old doors slowly open, with sunlight slowly creepin' it's way in the cabin. You quickly exit and see the whole village up on it's feet. on one side, people are collecting wood for the upcoming winter. On the other you see miners happily exiting the mines. From the moment your dad told you the stories of his adventures, you wanted to Learn how to fight, and beat the forces of darkness (that will of course not happen).


There is a stick lying on the ground...if you're going to become a great warrior (and you're not), it's time to start practicing.

action_results.action: Beat the crap out of the nearby tree!
action_results.result: You look at the tree that was staring at you towards the window when you were sleeping..every night you felt like it was staring at your soul. It's time to get revenge. How do you approach this?

action_results.action: Charge at it and hit it as hard as you can!
action_results.result:
You charge the tree with all of your strenght! As soon as you touch it, you fall on the ground.


You quickly pick yourself up, take the stick again, and mumble: "You win this round."

action_results.action: Circle the tree and wait for the right moment to strike!
action_results.result:
You circle the tree... and then you see it... on the right side of the tree there's a place from where it's bleeding.


Judging by the stories your father told you, enemies weakest spot is where he's wounded.


You get ready to charge the tree, but your father stands in front of you.


"C'mon kiddo, time for lunch..." He knells in front of you, then, while smiling, says:


"You need to have a full belly if you're going to take that tree..let's go and have lunch".


You decide to aggre with you're dad, because it sounds logical to fight better with a full belly.


After all, your father was an adventurer, he would know what to do before a battle

Age 13


Over the years, while fighting the tree, you have improved your melee skill by 1. Also, you have gained some respect with the tree (you've also figured that the tree is watching you, because it's guarding the house)


You are sitting in front of the blacksmith and talking with your best friend, Will (short for Willhem).


He was just telling you about a game he came up with, but then you see a carriage come with a bunch of wheat. Your mothers told both of you that they need wheat by sunset... and you've been too lazy to get it. This is a great chance to get it, You two climb on a nearby house and jump on the carriage. Just as you land you see two other boys trying to do the same thing. You have seen them before, they don't need this wheat as much as you do.


They see you. Will is collecting the wheat. on of the boys is getting ready to attack Will!
